welcome_message_body: Welcome to Juarez, where the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and rich history await you. We invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Biggs AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at El Paso International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the ELP Free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
